Literature.Title: Defensing role of novel piscidins from largemouth bass (Micropterus salmoides) with evidence of bactericidal activities and inducible expressional delineation.
Literature.Author: Duan Y, Ouyang J, Mo G, Hao W, Zhang P, Yang H, Liu X, Wang R, Cao B, Wang Y, Yu H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10.33% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Fish erythrocytes:11.53% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Fathead minnow muscle cells (FHM):25.57%  Killing=200 µg/ml,Epithelioma papulosum cyprini cells (EPC):24.34% Killing=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Nocardia asteroides(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Vibrio brasiliensis(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Vibrio fluvialis(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Vibrio splendidus(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Aeromonas sobria(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii(MIC=18.75µg/ml)
